comment: One of the best professors that I have ever had. She was very helpful with essays. She does take attendance. She really loves to help her students out and want them all to succeed. I would definitely take her again if I had the chance.

Def be ready for group activities and presentations. She provides feedback on rough drafts before final draft. She wants you to succeed/has office hrs. Responds to emails in a timely manner. Come to class daily bc there are always in class activities. Overall, one of the best profs I've had my first semester at KSU. I'm taking her again for 1102!
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
